| Name                    = Defenders

| BaseOfOperations        = Defenders Headquarters (The Richmond Riding Academy)

| Leaders                 = None established, although [[Alceus (Earth-616)|Hercules]] was nominated to represent the group. Squads were taken out into New York City led by [[Kyle Richmond (Earth-616)|Nighthawk]], [[Brunnhilde (Earth-616)|Valkyrie]] and [[Patricia Walker (Earth-616)|Hellcat]]
| CurrentMembers          = None
| FormerMembers           = [[Alceus (Earth-616)|Hercules]], [[Samuel Wilson (Earth-616)|Falcon]], [[Hobie Brown (Earth-616)|Prowler]], [[Jonathan Hart (Earth-616)|Jack of Hearts]], [[Carol Danvers (Earth-616)|Ms. Marvel]], [[Mar-Vell (Earth-616)|Captain Marvel]], [[Daimon Hellstrom (Earth-616)|Son of Satan]], [[William Foster (Earth-616)|Black Goliath]], [[Lorna Dane (Earth-616)|Polaris]], [[Alexander Summers (Earth-616)|Havok]], [[Tagak (Earth-616)|Tagak]], [[Daniel Thomas Rand-K'ai (Earth-616)|Iron Fist]], [[Walter Newell (Earth-616)|Stingray]], [[Richard Rider (Earth-616)|Nova]], [[Wendell Vaughn (Earth-616)|Marvel Man]], [[Griffin Gogol (Earth-616)|Captain Ultra]], [[Brock Jones (Earth-616)|Torpedo]], [[Paladin (Earth-616)|Paladin]], [[Hector Ayala (Earth-616)|White Tiger]]

| Origin                  = A gathering of heroes who answered [[Aaron English (Earth-616)|Dollar Bill's]] call for people to join the group in a documentary film that was made about the Defenders.
| PlaceOfFormation        = [[Richmond Riding Academy]], [[Long Island]], [[New York (State)|New York State]]

| Creators                = David Kraft; Sal Buscema
| First                   = Defenders #62
| Last                    = Defenders #65

| HistoryText             = When the Defenders' associate [[Aaron English (Earth-616)|Dollar Bill]] created a documentary about the group and aired it on television without their permission, it attracted a group of super-heroes who were interested in joining the group. They were interested in joining because of the Defenders' lack of rules and loose formation. This led to a disaster as the large group of different personalities often clashed and the poor leadership of this large group (led by long-standing Defenders [[Kyle Richmond (Earth-616)|Nighthawk]], [[Brunnhilde (Earth-616)|Valkyrie]] and [[Patricia Walker (Earth-616)|Hellcat]]). Their first and last mission was against a team of super-villains (Led by [[Libra (LMD) (Earth-616)|Libra]] and [[Sagittarius (LMD) (Earth-616)|Sagittarius]]) who had joined together. The villains also called themselves the [[Defenders (Villains) (Earth-616)|Defenders]], using the publicity of Dollar Bill's documentary to give the Defenders a bad name.

Although they managed to defeat the villains, the experience proved to be so haphazard, and disorganized that all the "Defenders for the Day" quit.
